#text=In a couple days , me and some friends were going to celebrate the good weather by going biking .
#text=I had my bike sit in my garage for a couple years not using it .
#text=So when I decided to get it out , to my surprise it had flat tires .
#text=I struggled to get the bike out of the garage with all the other junk in it , and found my tire pump along with it .
#text=After I got my bike out , I kneeled near the bike and found cap for the tire .
#text=I unscrewed it with a pair of pliers because it was on tight .
#text=I plugged the hose into the tire and started pumping until it was at a good level .
#text=I quickly unplugged the air pump and screwed the cap back on .
#text=After this I moved over to the rear tire , and repeated the same process to fix my flat bicycle tire .
